body:
Partition loss on Windows 7 refers to that one or more partition is no longer visible on a computer that runs Windows 7 operating system. If you are in a situation that needs to recover lost partition on Windows 7, you should protect the hard disk from being destroyed due to any reason and then look for a partition recovery program that can be compatible with Windows 7 OS.

This software will help with data recovery from lost partitions without rewriting new data or change original data to the disk partition. Therefore, it is 100% safe to use iCare Data Recovery to perform [lost partition data recovery on Windows 7](http://www.icare-recovery.com/partition-recovery/recover-files-from-lost-partition.html). iCare Data Recovery is mainly targeted towards Windows OS users to recover data from deleted partition, lost partition, formatted partition, corrupted partition and so on.

### Partition Got Deleted due to Mistake
It is different from deleting files or folders from a disk when you want to [delete the partition in Windows 7](http://www.icare-recovery.com/windows-7-recovery/windows-7-deleted-partition-recovery.html), because you cannot simply delete a partition by right clicking the partition. You need to go to "Disk Management" and right click the partition, and then select "Delete" option to delete a partition. It sounds a little ridiculous if somebody deletes a partition due to mistake, but such kind of thing happens to somebody. Anyway, when a partition is deleted due to mistake, the files stored on the partition will also be deleted. Now, if you want to [restore the deleted partition](http://www.icare-recovery.com/howto/deleted-partition-recovery.html) with its data back, iCare Data Recovery is the best choice.

### Partition Loss due to Virus Infection
Computer virus often has serious influence on your computer, which may destroy or corrupt the data store on your computer. Even worse, it may cause partition loss. When a partition got lost due to virus infection, you cannot restore the lost partition simply by removing the virus with help of anti-virus software. You need to rely on partition recovery software like iCare Data Recovery to get back the lost files from lost partition. However, the recovered files might be still inaccessible or corrupted because virus has destroyed them.

### Partition Missing after Reinstalling System
Do you find that one partition or several partitions got lost after reinstalling operating system? Usually, when we open "My Computer" and all partitions will show there. However, when we find some partitions just disappeared in "My Computer", we may think that the partitions got lost. If you also encounter such a situation, the first thing you need to do is to open "Disk Management". You may find an unallocated volume there. If so, you can assign a drive letter to this partition to see what will happen next. If you cannot find an unallocated volume in "Disk Management", you may need to find some other solution to get back the lost partitions. Whatever, if you don’t want to lose data stored on the lost partitions, you may run iCare Data Recovery to perform lost partition recovery first off all before you do anything else.
